Texts.Chs: 耳廓狐队对鼠族及其需要的看法。
Texts.Eng: Fenerox views on Kirhos and their needs.

Texts.Chs: 鼠族能做出令人惊叹的东西。我们知道这一点。他们是教说写星际语的导师。我们学习，但是很难。但是鼠族缺少一样东西。坚韧。他们软弱而胆怯。 也许曾经做过猎物。耳廓狐坚韧，速度更快。 鼠族人舞文弄墨。我们舞刀弄枪。所以我们去找鼠族人。
Texts.Eng: Kirhos make amazing things. We knows this. Them is teaches to speak and write in Galactic Tongue. Us learns, but is hard. But Kirhos lack one thing. Tough. Are weak and fluffy. Prey animals once, maybe. Fenerox tough, and faster. Kirhos talk much. We hunt much. So we hunt for Kirhos.

Texts.Chs: 我们从来没有告诉鼠族人他们是弱者，因为他们给了我们技术，教我们比其他的耳廓狐更好。相反，我们让鼠族人活着。作为交换，鼠族人可能会帮助整个星间所有其他耳廓狐部落。 每个人都会受益。 鼠族受我们保护，而我们更强大。然后有一天，我们创造了帝国。我们统治一切。但是不要告诉任何人。保守秘密。
Texts.Eng: We never tell Kirhos they is weaker, because they gave us technology and teach us to be better than other Fenerox. Instead, we keep Kirhos alive. In exchange, Kirhos may help Uplift all other Fenerox tribes across galaxy. Everyone benefit. Kirhos protected, We stronger. And then one day, we make Empire. We rule. But no tell anyone. Keeping secret.
